definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Zhongnanhai, palace adjacent to the Forbidden City, now the central headquarters of the Communist Party and the State Council
Nanhai district of Foshan city 佛山市[Fo2 shan1 shi4], Guangdong
see 天南地北[tian1 nan2 di4 bei3]
Nanhaizi, name used to refer to various places, including 草海[Cao3 hai3], 南苑[Nan2 yuan4] and the Nanhaizi Wetland in Baotou, Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: The South China Sea is a marginal sea of Eastern Asia.
sentences.chinese: 南海是亚洲东部的一个边缘海。

sentences.english: Our factory is located in the "hardware village, " said Sands, Nanhai District, Foshan City.
sentences.chinese: 本厂位于有“五金之乡”之称的佛山市南海区金沙。

sentences.english: Peace and stability in the South China Sea is simply indispensable when we talk about development of countries in the region.
sentences.chinese: 南海和平稳定是本地区各国发展的必要条件。

sentences.english: This paper also discussed the utilization of it' s resources.
sentences.chinese: 本文还对南海带鱼资源的开发利用进行探讨和分析。

sentences.english: The northern SCS is dominated mainly by a cyclonic circulation system.
sentences.chinese: 南海北部环流系统主要受气旋环流所支配。

sentences.english: X60 pipe line steel used on the pipeline project of South China Sea by shell oil company.
sentences.chinese: 钢板应用于壳牌石油公司南海管道项目。

sentences.english: In July, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton challenged China over its claims to wide areas of the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 七月，国务卿希拉蕊挑战南海主权上挑战中国。

sentences.english: Zhan Tianyou was born in 1861, in Nanhai County, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 詹天佑1861年出生在广东省南海县。

sentences.english: Why are Chinese jets being aggressive against any non-Chinese military presence here?
sentences.chinese: 为什么中国飞机对南海的非中国军事存在咄咄逼人。

sentences.english: There is a statue of Avalokitesvara, which is the highest Bodhisattva statue in East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 有一座南海观音像，是东海带最高的菩萨像。

sentences.english: He was a romantic who went off to the South Seas to paint pictures.
sentences.chinese: 他远赴南海去绘画，是个富有浪漫气质的人。

sentences.english: Their variations in increase and decrease are closely related to the monsoons of South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 这些变性水团的消长变化与南海的季风密切相关。

sentences.english: We are all the villagers, the village is a family.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是地球村的村民，天南海北都是一家人。

sentences.english: Sanshui's crude oil in the east of South China Sea has been evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 对南海东部三水原油进行初步评价。

sentences.english: Many people go to Nanhai on vacation, because it's beautiful and sunny.
sentences.chinese: 很多人去南海度假，因为那里既漂亮又晴朗。

sentences.english: Sparus macrocephalus and Sparus berda belong to genus Sparus in family Sparide.
sentences.chinese: 灰鳍鲷同属于鲷科鲷属，在我国仅分布于南海。

definition: East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
Spratly Islands, disputed between China, Malaysia, the Philippines, Taiwan and Vietnam
the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
Paracel Islands, in the South China Sea
Huangyan Island (in the South China Sea)
see 西沙群島|西沙群岛[Xi1 sha1 Qun2 dao3]
